file_content.text: I thought the Empire was going to kill us. Thank you , Master Jedi.
Thank you, Master Jedi, I am in your debt.
I knew someone would come. Our armed forces are an inspiration to everyone.
This war won't stop until it's torn Corellia apart. I have to get offworld, and soon.
My family is in your debt, thank you!
Do you know who I am? This rescue should never have taken so long.
I can't believe it--I thought we were doomed. Thank you!
